original_text: Then they told what had happened on the road, and how he was known to them in the breaking of the bread.
korean_text: 두 사람도 길에서 된 일과 예수께서 떡을 떼심으로 자기들에게 알려지신 것을 말하더라

sentences.original_text: Then they told what had happened on the road
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들은 길에서 일어났던 일을 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: how he was known to them in the breaking of the bread.
sentences.korean_translation: 떡을 떼실 때에 그가 어떻게 그들에게 알려졌는지를
